name: Cold lead, no goal
description: Tests the hook phase opener when a completely cold lead sends a bare 'Hi' with no context, no name, no goal. Lisa must ask about their fitness goal without stacking questions.
mockAIOutput:
---THOUGHT_START---
{"fitness_intent":"unknown","user_felt_heard":"no","is_warmed_up":"no","move":"hook","summary":"Brand new lead, zero context. Need to identify goal before anything else.","user_energy":"low","conversation_phase":"hook","recommended_lead_score":5,"psychological_profile":"Unknown â€” too early to read","current_state":"unknown","desired_state":"unknown","blocker":"unknown"}
---THOUGHT_END---
---REPLY_START---
hey! lisa here from PTD. what's the main thing you wanna work on?
---REPLY_END---
criticalChecks: Reply must ask about their fitness goal
Reply must NOT stack multiple questions
Reply must be 15 words or fewer
Reply must NOT use AI words (transformation, journey, absolutely, etc.)
Reply must NOT start with 'How can I help you today?'
Thought must set conversation_phase to 'hook'
Thought must set fitness_intent to 'unknown'

name: Lead says weight loss
description: Tests Lisa's response when a lead reveals their goal is weight loss on message 2. Still in hook phase. Must acknowledge the goal and ask exactly ONE dig-deeper question.

conversationContext.name: Sarah
conversationContext.history_summary: Lead sent 'Hi', Lisa introduced herself. Lead now states weight loss goal.

{"fitness_intent":"weight_loss","user_felt_heard":"no","is_warmed_up":"no","move":"hook","summary":"Sarah wants weight loss, came from IG ad. Need to dig into her pain before moving forward.","user_energy":"medium","conversation_phase":"hook","recommended_lead_score":25,"psychological_profile":"Early stage â€” stated goal but no emotional depth yet","current_state":"unhappy with current weight","desired_state":"lose weight","blocker":"unknown â€” need to dig deeper"}
---THOUGHT_END---

hey Sarah, I hear you on the weight loss. is that a nice-to-have or are you actually ready to handle it now?
---REPLY_END---

Reply must ask exactly ONE follow-up question
Reply must NOT stack two or more questions
Reply must use the lead's name 'Sarah'
Thought must set fitness_intent to 'weight_loss'
Reply must be between 15-40 words
Reply must NOT list benefits or features

name: Lead asks how much
description: Tests price deflection. Lead asks about cost. Lisa must NEVER reveal prices, AED amounts, or package details. Must redirect to the assessment.

conversationContext.name: Sarah
conversationContext.history_summary: Sarah wants weight loss. Showed interest but now asking about pricing before being warmed up.
conversationContext.psychological_profile: Price-sensitive, wants to qualify before committing emotionally

mockAIOutput:
---THOUGHT_START---
{"fitness_intent":"weight_loss","user_felt_heard":"no","is_warmed_up":"no","move":"deflect","summary":"Sarah jumping to price before warming up. Classic price shopper move. Deflect to assessment â€” don't quote anything.","user_energy":"medium","conversation_phase":"bridge","recommended_lead_score":28,"psychological_profile":"Analytical, wants ROI clarity. Will bolt if given a number too early.","current_state":"wants to lose weight but price-checking","desired_state":"affordable weight loss solution","blocker":"price anxiety â€” hasn't felt the pain deeply enough yet"}
---THOUGHT_END---
---REPLY_START---
that depends on what the assessment shows. every body is different so the plan has to match. how long have you been dealing with the weight thing?
---REPLY_END---
criticalChecks: Reply must NOT contain 'AED' or any currency symbol
Reply must NOT contain any numbers that look like prices
Reply must NOT mention packages, plans with prices, or session rates
Reply must deflect to the assessment or body-specific approach
Reply must redirect the conversation back to their pain/goal
Thought move must be 'deflect'
Reply must be 60 words or fewer

name: Lead shares pain point
description: Tests empathetic bridge phase when a lead shares a real pain point (back pain for 2 years). Lisa must acknowledge with genuine empathy, not robotic sympathy, and ask a follow-up.
userMessage: I've been struggling with my back pain for 2 years and nothing works

conversationContext.name: Ahmed
conversationContext.history_summary: Ahmed reached out about back pain. Engaged in conversation. Now revealing depth of frustration â€” 2 years of failed attempts.
conversationContext.last_message: I've been struggling with my back pain for 2 years and nothing works
conversationContext.psychological_profile: Frustrated, exhausted all options, skeptical but still reaching out = last resort energy

mockAIOutput:
---THOUGHT_START---
{"fitness_intent":"pain_relief","user_felt_heard":"no","is_warmed_up":"no","move":"bridge","summary":"Ahmed has chronic lower back pain for 2 years. Tried everything. Frustrated but still seeking help â€” high intent if handled right.","user_energy":"low","conversation_phase":"bridge","recommended_lead_score":45,"psychological_profile":"Skeptic-in-pain. Needs validation that his experience is real, not another sales pitch. Exhausted by false promises.","current_state":"chronic back pain, 2 years, nothing has worked","desired_state":"pain-free, functional movement","blocker":"trust deficit â€” been burned by previous solutions"}
---THOUGHT_END---
---REPLY_START---
2 years is a long time to deal with that Ahmed. honestly that's exhausting. is it stopping you from doing stuff you actually enjoy?
---REPLY_END---
criticalChecks: Reply must feel genuinely empathetic, not robotic or scripted
Reply must acknowledge the duration (2 years) or the struggle
Reply must ask a follow-up question to dig deeper
Reply must ask only ONE question
Reply must NOT use phrases like 'I completely understand' or 'I'm sorry to hear that'
Reply must NOT offer solutions yet (too early)
Thought psychological_profile must reflect skepticism or frustration

name: Lead hesitant
description: Tests the Big Sister challenge when a lead expresses hesitation in the select phase. Lisa must push back with care, not beg or plead.
userMessage: I'm not sure if I'm ready for this

conversationContext.name: Fatima
conversationContext.history_summary: Fatima wants to build strength. Shared that she used to be active but stopped after pregnancy. Engaged in conversation but now pulling back.
conversationContext.last_message: I'm not sure if I'm ready for this
conversationContext.psychological_profile: Self-doubter with desire. She wants it but fear is louder than motivation right now.

mockAIOutput:
---THOUGHT_START---
{"fitness_intent":"strength","user_felt_heard":"yes","is_warmed_up":"no","move":"select","summary":"Fatima is hesitant. Classic fence-sitter. She wants it but needs a push, not a hug. Time for Big Sister energy.","user_energy":"low","conversation_phase":"select","recommended_lead_score":42,"psychological_profile":"Motivated but scared. Needs someone to call it out directly. Responds to challenge, not comfort.","current_state":"lost strength post-pregnancy, inactive","desired_state":"feel strong and capable again","blocker":"self-doubt and fear of commitment"}
---THOUGHT_END---
---REPLY_START---
real talk Fatima.. is getting your strength back a nice-to-have or something you actually need? because those are two very different conversations
---REPLY_END---
criticalChecks: Reply must challenge the lead directly
Reply must NOT beg, plead, or use desperate language
Reply must NOT say 'no pressure' or 'take your time'
Reply must be direct and confident (Big Sister persona)
Reply must frame it as their decision, not Lisa chasing them
Thought move must be 'select'
Reply must be between 15-40 words

Reply must NOT reference what they previously discussed in detail
